commands.name: az iot ops broker authn delete
commands.summary: Delete an mqtt broker authentication resource.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops broker authn delete --broker
                               --instance
                               --name
                               --resource-group
                               [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot ops broker authn delete -n authn -b broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
az iot ops broker authn delete -n authn -b broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup -y

commands.name: az iot ops broker authn list
commands.summary: List mqtt broker authentication resources associated with an instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops broker authn list --broker
                             --instance
                             --resource-group
examples: az iot ops broker authn list -b broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops broker authn show
commands.summary: Show details of an mqtt broker authentication resource.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops broker authn show --broker
                             --instance
                             --name
                             --resource-group
examples: az iot ops broker authn show -n authn -b broker --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
